I just finished watching this movie and I was not left with a good impression. The movie did not suck as other movies in the past but it was just not a god story/plot. Mostly glamorized action/violence. Just a lot of unlikely events in an unlikely reality. I know it is a movie but still. I do not want to say not to watch it but you need to see if I am right with my assessment. I started last night and I actually fell asleep watching it about half way.

Hey everyone. I love TPB and love sharing, but i need some advice i couldnt find anywhere. Sometimes when i turn off my computer and start it back up again, in my torrent program (bittorrent) where the completed files are that are uploading it says there is an error (missing files) and they wont upload unless i start it all over again. I dont want to start these downloads all over again obviously, but also dont want to be a jip and not share, what up with this as i dont want to have to delete torrents i just downloaded because they are not working, thanks for any advice.

@kpl1010:

When people list things like "A: V: M:" that is them giving their rating (on a 10-scale) of the file in terms of Audio quality, Video quality, and overall Movie quality.

V = 1/10 of video quality
A = 1/10 of audio quality
M = 1/10 of that persons like/dislike of the movie
not music like a few think ;p
